title: Spotted: Zoceli Naosm steel 29er enduro bike handcrafted in the Czech Republic
content:
Zoceli has been teasing their handmade steel 29er Naosm full-suspension enduro bike for over a year now. But after a number of iterations and prototypes, Czech freerider, designer & frame builder Martin Saida seems set to offer his unique short-link, virtual pivot enduro bike to a broader audience. Zoceli Naosm steel 160mm full-suspension 29er enduro […]

The post Spotted: Zoceli Naosm steel 29er enduro bike handcrafted in the Czech Republic appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
